title: Numbers (spreadsheet)
summary: Numbers is a spreadsheet application developed by Apple Inc. as part of the iWork productivity suite alongside Keynote and Pages.[3] Numbers is available for iOS, and macOS High Sierra or newer.[4] Numbers 1.0 on OS X was announced on 7 August 2007, making it the newest application in the iWork suite. The iPad version was released on 27 January 2010.[5] The app was later updated to support iPhone and iPod Touch.
